## Approach and Methodology



#### Load the required packages and dataset


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
library(pROC)
library(MLmetrics)
library(fastDummies)
library(skimr)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mall <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/karolo89/WEBKOE/main/projects/MarketSegmentation/Mall_Customers.csv")

skim(mall)
```
